pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, July 25, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Maskwacîs, Alberta

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Papal visit in Ermineskin Cree Nation. Minister of Indigenous Services and Minister responsible for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Northern Ontario Patty Hajdu and Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Marc Miller will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
